-- | Extends explicit-iomodes with Text operations
--   
--   Extends <tt>explicit-iomodes</tt> with <tt>Text</tt> operations
@package explicit-iomodes-text
@version 0.1.0.8


-- | This module lifts the lazy <a>Text</a> IO operations to handles with
--   explicit IOModes.
module Data.Text.Lazy.IO.ExplicitIOModes

-- | Wraps <tt>Data.Text.Lazy.IO.<a>hGetLine</a></tt>.
hGetLine :: ReadModes ioMode => Handle ioMode -> IO Text

-- | Wraps <tt>Data.Text.Lazy.IO.<a>hGetContents</a></tt>.
hGetContents :: ReadModes ioMode => Handle ioMode -> IO Text

-- | Wraps <tt>Data.Text.Lazy.IO.<a>hPutStr</a></tt>.
hPutStr :: WriteModes ioMode => Handle ioMode -> Text -> IO ()

-- | Wraps <tt>Data.Text.Lazy.IO.<a>hPutStrLn</a></tt>.
hPutStrLn :: WriteModes ioMode => Handle ioMode -> Text -> IO ()


-- | This module lifts the <a>Text</a> IO operations to handles with
--   explicit IOModes.
module Data.Text.IO.ExplicitIOModes

-- | Wraps <tt>Data.Text.IO.<a>hGetLine</a></tt>.
hGetLine :: ReadModes ioMode => Handle ioMode -> IO Text

-- | Wraps <tt>Data.Text.IO.<a>hGetContents</a></tt>.
hGetContents :: ReadModes ioMode => Handle ioMode -> IO Text

-- | Wraps <tt>Data.Text.IO.<a>hPutStr</a></tt>.
hPutStr :: WriteModes ioMode => Handle ioMode -> Text -> IO ()

-- | Wraps <tt>Data.Text.IO.<a>hPutStrLn</a></tt>.
hPutStrLn :: WriteModes ioMode => Handle ioMode -> Text -> IO ()
